entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as someone who has become used to isolation and has nearly forgotten that other people are resisting Voldemort. He is also mentioned as being excited about something Fred said.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as having familiar and friendly voices, and he is also mentioned as saying that the others keep on the move like them.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as admiringly sighing about the bravery of others.

relationships.description: Harry and Ron are described as having familiar, friendly voices.
Harry and Hermione are mentioned together in the same context, suggesting a friendship between them.
Ron is described as saying something to Harry, indicating a close relationship between them.
